active_tasks.title: Research Lead Generation Strategies & Performance Analytics
steps: Collect strategy documentation from Burda Anna and Shkinder Kseniia
Review existing LG performance data and analytics from CRM
Research industry best practices for lead generation strategies
Analyze current LG team performance metrics vs. industry benchmarks
Document findings and recommendations
Prepare evaluation framework for LG department performance
resources: Strategy documentation from Burda Anna and Shkinder Kseniia
active_tasks.instructions: This is a critical priority task to support the Lead Generation department evaluation. The research should help determine whether the issue is strategy vs. people, and inform decision-making about potential restructuring. Focus on data-driven analysis and actionable recommendations.
active_tasks.content:
**Steps:**
Collect strategy documentation from Burda Anna and Shkinder Kseniia
Review existing LG performance data and analytics from CRM
Research industry best practices for lead generation strategies
Analyze current LG team performance metrics vs. industry benchmarks
Document findings and recommendations
Prepare evaluation framework for LG department performance

**Resources:**
- CRM analytics data
- Performance tracking systems
- Lead Generation Platform (l-gn) project documentation
- Strategy documentation from Burda Anna and Shkinder Kseniia

**Instructions:**
This is a critical priority task to support the Lead Generation department evaluation. The research should help determine whether the issue is strategy vs. people, and inform decision-making about potential restructuring. Focus on data-driven analysis and actionable recommendations.

active_tasks.title: Schedule & Organize Weekly Department Calls
steps: Create Google Calendar schedule with bi-weekly rotation:
Set up calendar invites for all departments
Create call templates with pre-defined goals and structure
Distribute templates to department heads
Prepare meeting documentation structure for each call type
active_tasks.instructions: Establish systematic bi-weekly calls to prevent forgotten touchpoints and ensure regular progress tracking. Each call should have clear templates and goals. Estimated 2-3 hours daily commitment for PM role.
active_tasks.content:
**Steps:**
Create Google Calendar schedule with bi-weekly rotation:
Set up calendar invites for all departments
Create call templates with pre-defined goals and structure
Distribute templates to department heads
Prepare meeting documentation structure for each call type

**Resources:**
- Google Calendar
- Meeting templates (to be created)
- Documentation structure templates
- Internal Operations, CRM project references

**Instructions:**
Establish systematic bi-weekly calls to prevent forgotten touchpoints and ensure regular progress tracking. Each call should have clear templates and goals. Estimated 2-3 hours daily commitment for PM role.

active_tasks.title: Record Training Video for File System Usage
steps: Review recorded video from morning Design call
Edit video to highlight key file system usage points
Add captions/annotations for clarity
Prepare video for distribution to LG team
Coordinate with Video team (Sviatoslav Podolskyi) if needed for editing
active_tasks.instructions: The video was already recorded during the Design call. Focus on editing and preparing it for distribution to Lead Generation team as part of their onboarding to the new file system.
active_tasks.content:
**Steps:**
Review recorded video from morning Design call
Edit video to highlight key file system usage points
Add captions/annotations for clarity
Prepare video for distribution to LG team
Coordinate with Video team (Sviatoslav Podolskyi) if needed for editing

**Resources:**
- Video recording from Design call (November 4)
- Video editing software
- Screen recording tools

**Instructions:**
The video was already recorded during the Design call. Focus on editing and preparing it for distribution to Lead Generation team as part of their onboarding to the new file system.

active_tasks.title: Distribute File System Training to Lead Generation Team
steps: Complete video editing (Task 3)
Upload video to accessible location (Dropbox/Discord)
Prepare announcement message for LG team
Distribute via Discord and Email
Ensure all LG team members have Dropbox access
Schedule follow-up Q&A session if needed
active_tasks.instructions: This task depends on Task 3 completion. Ensure all LG team members receive clear instructions and have access to the training materials. The goal is to onboard LG department to the new file system workflow.
active_tasks.content:
**Steps:**
Complete video editing (Task 3)
Upload video to accessible location (Dropbox/Discord)
Prepare announcement message for LG team
Distribute via Discord and Email
Ensure all LG team members have Dropbox access
Schedule follow-up Q&A session if needed

**Resources:**
- Training video (when ready)
- Discord channel
- Email distribution list
- Video hosting/Dropbox access
- File System Project documentation

**Instructions:**
This task depends on Task 3 completion. Ensure all LG team members receive clear instructions and have access to the training materials. The goal is to onboard LG department to the new file system workflow.

active_tasks.title: Compress & Optimize Main Prompt
steps: Review current Main Prompt version (v2.1)
Identify redundant or verbose sections
Apply AI compression techniques
Test compressed version for functionality
Update version control with changelog
Archive previous version in /version-control subfolder
active_tasks.instructions: Ongoing optimization work to reduce prompt size while maintaining functionality. Use AI compression techniques to create denser documentation. Maintain version control with clear changelogs.
active_tasks.content:
**Steps:**
Review current Main Prompt version (v2.1)
Identify redundant or verbose sections
Apply AI compression techniques
Test compressed version for functionality
Update version control with changelog
Archive previous version in /version-control subfolder

**Resources:**
- Current Main Prompt v2.md
- Cursor IDE
- VS Code
- AI compression techniques documentation
- RAC, File System project references

**Instructions:**
Ongoing optimization work to reduce prompt size while maintaining functionality. Use AI compression techniques to create denser documentation. Maintain version control with clear changelogs.

Prepare first meeting agenda focusing on Lead Generation automation progress

active_tasks.title: Document CRM Development Process for Future Microservices

Extract reusable patterns and templates

Add to RAC knowledge base

active_tasks.title: Test Transcript Quality and Accuracy
steps: Review transcripts from Design team members
Identify patterns in Whisper Flow transcription issues
Document language-switching bugs (English detection causing full transcript switch)
Validate accuracy of AI-generated plans against actual meeting content
Collect feedback from Design team on workflow effectiveness
Report findings and recommendations
active_tasks.instructions: Monitor and validate the automated daily planning workflow quality. Focus on identifying systematic issues (like language-switching bug) and ensuring AI-generated outputs maintain accuracy and usefulness.
active_tasks.content:
**Steps:**
Review transcripts from Design team members
Identify patterns in Whisper Flow transcription issues
Document language-switching bugs (English detection causing full transcript switch)
Validate accuracy of AI-generated plans against actual meeting content
Collect feedback from Design team on workflow effectiveness
Report findings and recommendations

**Resources:**
- Design team transcripts
- Whisper Flow documentation
- VS Code/Cursor with Claude
- Daily planning workflow documentation

**Instructions:**
Monitor and validate the automated daily planning workflow quality. Focus on identifying systematic issues (like language-switching bug) and ensuring AI-generated outputs maintain accuracy and usefulness.
